description: Backed by his metal band, stand-up comedian Jim Breuer talks about baseball, racial stereotypes, his old mangy mutt, partying at 16, and the trouble with mixing drinks. The stand-up lasts for 45 minutes. DVD version adds other mat...
keywords: stand up comedy,mixing drinks,impression,racial humor,racial stereotype
name: Jim Breuer: Heavy Metal Comedy

review.name: Worth watching once.
review.reviewBody: 4/7/18. Maybe 2 1/2 stars. I decided to watch this because he is an SNL alum. I caught a few of those episodes with him in it. He was all right and he was funny. He does do killer impressions, and he can sing heavy metal style! But, Comedy is really hard simply because it gets dated very quickly. He might have been totally hilarious in the early 2000s, but now he is just funny. Ouch. The DVD includes a 45-minute documentary with behind the scenes. Worth watching once.
